nodes.text: J'virgo N'yen was a female Twi'lek living on Makeb until 3638 BBY, when she was killed.

J'virgo N'yen appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Makeb. She is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means she was killed.
